sentence.Network_en: He is not fatuously content with existing conditions.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不会愚昧地满于现状的.

sentence.Network_en: This time the opportunity presented what he fatuously termed to himself a'cinch '.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一次出现的机会极为难得,他满以为十拿九稳哩.

sentence.Network_en: This time the opportunity presented what he fatuously termed to himself a cinch.
sentence.Network_cn: 他愚蠢地认为这一次他遇到了一个必然成功的机会.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...在选举前政治家们都力争选民的支持。3.fatuously adv. 愚蠢地；自满地He is not fatuously content with existing conditio.

means.word_mean: 1. vacuously or complacently and unconsciously foolish

auth_sentence.content: He smiles fatuously; he grimaces when things go wrong.
auth_sentence.res_content: He smiles fatuously; he grimaces when things go wrong.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He smiles fatuously; he grimaces when things go wrong.
